results.name: a(n) = sigma() [A000203] applied n times to prime(n).
mathematica: f[n_] := DivisorSigma[1, n]; Table[ Nest[f, Prime[n], n], {n, 25}] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Dec 22 2004 *)
